Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsnoticed a dark grey triangle about one hundred feet across with different colored lights follow the 1\2 mile airstrip 900 feet from my house.the craft had no sound and moved in a very straight line until it got to the pond where it turned and continued out of sight at 4 pm nov.1st.a red flashing light towards the middle bottom was flashing and around the craft were different colors that did not flash.the cat did a belly crawl inside the house for at least 10 minutes after the sighting.also an orange ball the size of a beach ball followed the craft,about 500 feet behind in a straight line with the craft.the reason i saw the craft was the cat jumped up on the bay window sill and acted very differently which made me look in the direction of the cat.this is when i noticed movement coming from the north side of the airstrip.you could not miss the sighting once you looked out of my office window over the deck.when i first saw the triangle figure and the different colored lights around the craft and the way it moved just above the treetops there was no question at what i was looking at.there is nothing in our inventory of flying machines that would float at such a crawl and emit no sound at all.when the craft made a slow turn over the pond i lost sight of the craft because of the 50ft or so over the ground.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around November 1st 2011
Summary: I own a half mile airstrip with a pond next to it.This craft at about 5 mph at around treetop level followed the airstrip from north to south.
